record.dc:title: 273BN77 McDaniel, Benton County, Tennessee. Burial 87BN1. A very poor burial, but probably as good as any found so far. Piece of scratched red ochre at head. Stratum I, bottom. Square 10CA. Direction Northeast.
record.wpa:narrative: Indeterminate adult to mature in poor condition, most of these bones are rotted - putty-like. Fully flexed, flesh burial on right side, right arm beneath, left folded in front, head oriented to SW. Probably as good a burial as we will get, the soil seems unsuited to bone preservation.
